task.title: How to Make a Caramel Frappe
task.shortdesc: This delightful drink will certainly wake you up!

step.cmd: Remove previously made almond milk ice cubes from freezer.
Strain the cold brew through a coffee filter fitted over a coffee pot.
Add all ice cubes to a blender as well as cup of the coffee and 5 tbsp of the caramel sauce to start out.
Blend until smooth, adding more coffee if it's too thick.
Taste and adjust flavors as needed.
Serve immediately, topped with coconut whipped cream and/or more caramel sauce.
